LanguageData.ShowUmbrellasHelp: ☔ ENABLED: Umbrella graphics will be displayed when a pawn is actively using an umbrella to block weather or sunlight. Does not apply to hats. ○ DISABLED: Umbrella graphics will not be displayed, but umbrellas will still block weather and sunlight. ↻ DEFAULT: enabled
LanguageData.UmbrellasBlockSunHelp: ☔ ENABLED: Umbrellas will block sunlight for pawns with sunlight sensitivity. Does not apply to hats. ○ DISABLED: Umbrellas will not block sunlight. ↻ DEFAULT: enabled
LanguageData.UmbrellaHatsHelp: ☔ ENABLED: Certain hats will block light rain. Hats will never block heavy rain, weather effects, or sunlight. Only the cowboy hat is supported by default, but mods may add additional hats. ○ DISABLED: Hats will not block light rain. ↻ DEFAULT: enabled
LanguageData.EncumberWork: Reduce work speed while using an umbrella:
LanguageData.EncumberWorkHelp: ☔ ENABLED: Pawn work speed -15% when using an umbrella. Applies only when an umbrella is actively deployed against weather or sunlight. Does not apply to hats. ○ DISBALED: Pawns will not receive a work speed debuff. ↻ DEFAULT: enabled
LanguageData.EncumberCombat: Worse accuracy and aiming speed when using an umbrella:
LanguageData.EncumberCombatHelp: ☔ ENABLED: Pawn shoot accuracy -15% and aim delay +15% when using an umbrella. Applies only when an umbrella is actively deployed against weather or sunlight. Does not apply to hats. ○ DISABLED: Pawns will not receive accuracy or aim delay debuffs. ↻ DEFAULT: enabled
